item.title: 3 Maps: Locator, Topographical, and Treasure
item.description: These maps already exist but are obscured to you. Be alert to facts that affect your projects or organization. Continually sift information out of the noise around you, e.g., a shift in corporate priorities could mean a platform you’d considered but backburnered has become an amazing investment. The Locator Map: Getting Perspective Time you spend absorbed in any domain increases your depth and understanding, but it comes with some risks, e.
